description: Try our easy to follow Easy Triple Decker Finger Sandwiches recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken sandwich,High tea,Seafood free,Healthier Easier,Quick & easy lunch,Picnic,Tomato,Back to school,Chicken
name: Easy Triple Decker Finger Sandwiches Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp olive oil spread, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly spread one side of the wholemeal bread slices and both sides of the white bread with olive oil spread and place on board.
Thinly slice the chicken, then arrange in one layer over the buttered side of one of the wholemeal slices and the white slice.
Peel and finely slice the avocado, and finely slice the tomato and cucumber, then arrange over the chicken.
Lift up the white slice and place on top of the topped slice of wholemeal.
Place the remaining wholemeal slice on top, butter-side down, then push down lightly to sandwich together.
Cut into fingers, trimming away the crusts first, if you like.
